info.title: LAN Helper
info.author: matteofo
info.description: LAN Play/XLink Kai IP Generator for CFW users
info.details: A Tesla Overlay that lets you quickly generate and set valid and unique IP addresses for Switch LAN Play and XLink Kai!\nOnce you're done playing, you can also use LAN Helper to quickly reset your IP address to be automatically assigned with DHCP.

changelog:
Release 1.2.0: Network cleanup update

This release allows you to remove any duplicate or "ghost" network interfaces created when using the reset feature.
UI improvements and QoL changes have been made!
Fixed compatibility issues with 21.x.x firmwares.
